abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: DatasetKey: DORSA - German Orthoptera Collections The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 17485 records from DORSA - German Orthoptera Collections

intellectualRights.para:
The data included in this download are provided to the user under a Creative Commons BY-NC 4.0 license (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/4.0) which means that you are free to use, share, and adapt the data provided that you give reasonable and appropriate credit (attribution) and that you do not use the material for commercial purposes (non-commercial).
Data from some individual datasets included in this download may be licensed under less restrictive terms; review the details below.
